categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation

nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 7

Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 7 is the seventh, final issue of the canon comic book miniseries Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation, which adapts the 2018 film of the same name. The issue was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published on April 3, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

THE FINAL SHOWDOWN! HAN SOLO is out of options and out of allies, and DRYDEN wants him dead. Will BECKETT's double-cross be Han's undoing? Will Han do the right thing despite that it could cost him and CHEWBACCA their lives? Find out in the thrilling conclusion to SOLO: A STAR WARS STORY, featuring material not seen in the film!
